seo.title: Riomaggiore Hiking Trails 2025 | Via dell'Amore & Coastal Paths
seo.description: Discover the best hiking trails from Riomaggiore including Via dell'Amore, the trail to Manarola, and sanctuary hikes with panoramic coastal views.

body.title: Via dell'Amore & Coastal Trails
body.subtitle: Start your Cinque Terre hiking adventure from Riomaggiore. Home to the famous Lover's Walk and spectacular trails connecting all five villages.

features.title: Via dell'Amore
features.description: The iconic Lover's Walk to Manarola, a romantic paved path carved into the cliff (20 min, easy)

features.title: Riomaggiore to Manarola
features.description: High route via vineyard terraces when Via dell'Amore is closed (1.5 hours, moderate)

features.title: Sanctuary Trail
features.description: Climb to Santuario di Montenero for panoramic views over the village and coast (40 min, steep)

features.title: Vineyard Paths
features.description: Walk through terraced Sciacchetr√† vineyards on ancient stone staircases

features.title: Blue Trail (SVA)
features.description: Part of the Sentiero Azzurro connecting all five villages along the coast

features.title: Coastal Viewpoints
features.description: Multiple scenic overlooks perfect for sunrise and sunset photography

body.title: Enhance Your Hiking Experience
body.description: Get detailed maps and learn about the best times to hike these spectacular trails.
